parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To make sufficient, render fit, qualify. From hikanos; to enable, i.e. Qualify.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Feminine of meros; a portion, i.e. Province, share or participation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a lot, (b) a portion assigned; hence: a portion of the people of God assigned to one's care, a congregation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
